video.title: Monster Math Squad
video.synopsis: Max, Lily and Goo love to put their minds together and use their math skills to overcome any obstacle, even ones with two left feet or ten thumbs.

episodes.synopsis: Bad Mood Monster needs the Monster Math Squad to walk his pet monster, Woofy, while he attends his nephew's party in the park.
episodes.title: Woofie Goes Walkies

episodes.synopsis: Miss Murkly can't bake her slimy grimy monster muffins! She has no way to measure the ingredients as someone has taken the numbers off her scale.
episodes.title: Number Muncher Monster

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Huge Horn Monster is missing her house! Smooth Moves Monster sets the Monster Math Squad on the track, but first they need to learn about size.
episodes.title: Missing Monster House

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Cranky Pants Monster is crankier then ever after Mess Monster has turned his store upside down. Can the Monster Math Squad fix the damage?
episodes.title: Big Monster Mess

episodes.synopsis: In the town of Monstrovia, the Garbage Monster delivers garbage to everyone's house, but he needs some math help to get all the orders correct.
episodes.title: Garbage Monster Delivers

episodes.synopsis: A call comes in over the Scream Screen - its Mrs. Mopely, the Day Scare teacher, who needs help to stop the scary face balloons from floating away.
episodes.title: Trouble at the Day Scare Centre

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Cranky Pants Monster's last customer left with the wrong scooter, and the Monster Math Squad has to learn about patterns to follow the trail.
episodes.title: Uncle Gloop's Big Blunder

episodes.synopsis: The Monstrovia library is being shaken to its foundation as Big Burp Monster searches for a book!
episodes.title: Big Burp Monster at the Library

episodes.synopsis: The Monster Math Squad help a group of little monsters figure out a game of musical chairs by knowing all about "more."
episodes.title: Monsters at Play

episodes.synopsis: The Squad drop by and show twins Even Stevie and Even Evie how to play a game of bowling and keep all the pins even as they go.
episodes.title: Monster Bowl Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: Picky Eater Monster is at Barks and Stench General Store to figure out how many items are needed for the picnic he is planning for his brother.
episodes.title: Picky Eater's Picnic

episodes.synopsis: Miss Murkly is all in a tizzy when a customer wants to return one of her famous Heavenly Half Muffins, even though the proportions were perfect.
episodes.title: A Muffin Mystery

episodes.synopsis: Long Tail Monster is trying to lead the Monster Stinkiness Parade, but whenever he starts marching all the other monsters suddenly disappear.
episodes.title: Who's on First

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Mopely is having a terrible time sorting out all the different scary face masks the little monsters have made for Scary Face Picture Day.
episodes.title: Scary Face Picture Day

episodes.synopsis: Miss Hattie Monster is trying to finish three hats for her next customer, but the Jingle Monsters and the Puff Monsters keep jumping off the hats.
episodes.title: Monster Hat Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: The Slime Cream Monster needs help counting the Slime Cream Sundaes he's selling from his truck to make sure he's giving customers the right amount.
episodes.title: Slime Cream Sundae

episodes.synopsis: The Squad is called by Stinky Feet Monster to find his footbath ingredients, and they discover that what he needs is located in unusual places.
episodes.title: The Big Stink

episodes.synopsis: Miss Murkly leaves her nephew, Muddle Monster, in charge of her muffin shop, but he gets everything so mixed up that she needs the Squad to help.
episodes.title: Monster Muffin Muddle

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Googly Eyed Monster needs help to get his Wally Ball-y rolling again, and the Monster Math Squad learns that Wally Ball-y needs to be on a slope.
episodes.title: Little Wally Ball-y Monster

episodes.synopsis: Hoppity Monster loves the game Monster Hopscotch, with its ten squares, but he wants MORE squares to hop in, so he calls in the Squad.
episodes.title: Monster Hopscotch

episodes.synopsis: The Abominable Fridge Monster has a problem: he needs to be full of food for his picnic with Mr. Cranky Pants Monster, but he can't fill himself up!
episodes.title: Sneeze Freeze

episodes.synopsis: When Garbage Monster wants to take a nap, he climbs on top of his garbage heap, but he needs the Squad to save the day when his heap gets too high.
episodes.title: Monster Garbage Heap

episodes.synopsis: Picky Eater Monster is afraid he doesn't have enough time to make loot bags for his brother's birthday party just the way he likes them.
episodes.title: The Scoop Troop

episodes.synopsis: Sydney Squid Monster is having a pink ink tea party, but she needs help counting the mucky-ucky marshmallows to see if she's ordered enough.
episodes.title: Monster Tea Party

episodes.synopsis: Falls Apart Monster is missing his nose after bumping into another monster, and the Squad use a Math Monitor to make a sketch of the mystery monster.
episodes.title: Falls Apart Monster Nose Woes

episodes.synopsis: The Squad offers to help some little monsters count the right number of coins to make a bucking monster toy give them a fun ride.
episodes.title: Bucking Monster Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: The Squad are asked to be judges at the famous Fang Festival, and they quickly make their way to the local park where the festival is taking place.
episodes.title: Monster Fang Festival

episodes.synopsis: Garbage Monster calls the Squad for help making teams for road hockey. Using the word divide, they get the right number of monsters for each team.
episodes.title: Monster Road Hockey

episodes.synopsis: The Squad use math to help Mr. Cranky Pants Monster deliver some fungus fingers, and discover that he's following the wrong line on the road.
episodes.title: Monster Traffic Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Cranky Pants Monster needs the Squad to put away some toys for him, but he warns them the toys can be very fussy and hard to put away properly.
episodes.title: A Bungle at Barks and Stench

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Cranky Pants Monster asks for help in packing up orders of Slime Cubes when he can't figure out the proper size of boxes in which to pack them.
episodes.title: Slime Cube Sale

episodes.synopsis: Monstrous romance is in the air as Nervous Nelly Monster calls the Squad to ask for help preparing a stinkweed bouquet on her wedding day.
episodes.title: Best Best Monsters Ever

episodes.synopsis: The Squad help Farmer Monster, who grows Toothy Plants with differing numbers of teeth, as he counts how many teeth each plant has.
episodes.title: Toothy Monster Plant Mix-Up

episodes.synopsis: The Squad helps a clumsy sculptor complete his latest monsterpiece by learning how volume is not affected by shape.
episodes.title: Muddy Monster

episodes.synopsis: Comparing objects enables the Squad to determine if the amount of water given to one plant is more or less than the amount given to another plant.
episodes.title: Uncle Gloop's Putrid Peppers

episodes.synopsis: The Squad help a monster follow a recipe for making a compost bed by learning that "sum" indicates the total of two or more objects added together.
episodes.title: Monster Bed Builders

episodes.synopsis: Some little monsters want to ride the new Monster-Go-Round, but they won't all fit, so the Squad use "subtract" to make two smaller sets of monsters.
episodes.title: Monster Go Round

episodes.synopsis: The Squad help unlock a joke box by using keys of differing shapes that fit into their keyholes only when they are in the correct position.
episodes.title: Monster Joke Box

episodes.synopsis: The Squad must go backward down a number line -- that is, from 5 to 3, and then from 5 to 1 -- to help Delivery Monster stay on schedule.
episodes.title: Delivery Monster Doesn't Deliver

episodes.synopsis: The Squad help bring about peace and quiet with the little monsters by learning that two sets of objects are equal if they each have the same numbers.
episodes.title: Mini Monsters Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: The Squad helps Miss Murkley make identical double cake orders for Even Stevie and Even Evie by cutting cakes into two symmetrical pieces.
episodes.title: Monster Cake Mistake

episodes.synopsis: The math-tastic power of Counting by Tens helps the Squad and Sally Scout Monster quickly figure out how many Crabapple Cookies Sally has to deliver.
episodes.title: Special Delivery

episodes.synopsis: The Squad learns about measuring time while helping Sporty Monster figure out which of his Slugmonsters can win the annual Slugmonsters' Race!
episodes.title: Slugmonsters' Race

episodes.synopsis: When Lickity Monster licks the stamps off the mail, the Squad put things right by learning that different shapes have different numbers of sides.
episodes.title: Mail Carrier Monster's Big Mess

episodes.synopsis: Three monsters of different weights learn which of three different-sized Honkers are the right match for them.
episodes.title: Too Heavy for the Hopping Honkers

episodes.synopsis: Muddle Monster wants to play Whack-a-Monster-Ball with Double Monster, but the Squad has to learn how to make everything double before DM will play!
episodes.title: Double Trouble

episodes.synopsis: The Squad helps Miss Hand Monster get her nails ready by using their knowledge of five to select the correct amount of nail polish.
episodes.title: Handmonster's Helpers

episodes.synopsis: Freezy Treat Monster's cart has broken down, so it's up to the Squad to reproduce the correct patterns of frozen gloop and decorations on the cones.
episodes.title: Monster Treat Trouble

episodes.synopsis: The Squad use their knowledge about "next" numbers in order to put Number Line Monster back together after he falls apart and to play a counting game.
episodes.title: Number Line Monster's New Game

episodes.synopsis: The Squad is enlisted by Maker Monster to help count and package up large numbers of toys quickly and accurately.
episodes.title: Monster Factory Fiasco
